sjm.parse.chars
Class CharacterAssembly

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sjm.parse.Assembly
        |
        +--sjm.parse.chars.CharacterAssembly
public class CharacterAssembly
extends Assembly

A CharacterAssembly is an Assembly whose elements are characters.

See Also:
Assembly
